mapper.insert: insert into kb_user(user_id, password, username, created_date) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{username}, now())
insert into kb_post(user_no, category, title, content, created_date) values (#{userNo}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
insert into kb_comment(user_no, post_no, content, created_date) values (#{userNo}, #{postNo}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, password as password, username as username, created_date as createdDate from kb_user
select post_no as postNo, user_no as userNo, category as category, title as title, content as content, created_date as createdDate, up as up, down as down from kb_post
select post_no as postNo, user_no as userNo, category as category, title as title, content as content, created_date as createdDate, up as up, down as down from kb_post where post_no = #{postNo}
select comment_no as commentNo, user_no as userNo, post_no as postNo, content as content, created_date as createdDate, up as up, down as down from kb_comment
select comment_no as commentNo, user_no as userNo, post_no as postNo, content as content, created_date as createdDate, up as up, down as down from kb_comment where comment_no = #{commentNo}
